name: Cheer Uniform
description:
New "modern" version

The original version is still good, but it based on the "classic" (think Night of Comet) cheerleader look that hasn't actually been used by cheerleaders for decades.

This new version is trained on the modern look. Choose whichever look you prefer. Strength of 1 gives a pretty standard result. Lower values give more creativity, usually reveal some midriff.

Keywords:

Modern version: moderncheerunifrom

Classic ("v1.0") version: cheeruniform

Info from Original ("1") version (still good!):

Fairly self-explanatory model. It is trained on over 400 adult cheerleader costumes (many of them sort of the "slutty Halloween" type). Using the phrase "cheerleader uniform" (or outfit or whatever) can also cause models to make the person wearing the uniform look like a stereotypical cheerleader, which may not be what you want. These were therefore trained with the keyword "cheeruniform" to focus entirely on the uniform and not the person wearing it. You must include the word cheeruniform (no spaces) for it to work.

The model is very strong. I included two images that show the same seed/prompt with various weightings. You can also use the LoRA to create cheeruniform-like clothing, such as the steampunk outfit I included.

I include things like ((words)) ((text)) ((logo)) in the negative prompt, but the awful lettering still creeps into a lot of the results.

"I feel a little under-dressed, but at least I'm not dressed like a slutty cheerleader, right?"

modelVersions.name: modern
modelVersions.description: Different training set, completely different look. These are modern cheerleader uniforms, generally sleeker and without the pleated skirt. This version does not replace the original, it is just an alternate option.

meta.prompt: sexy blonde woman in moderncheeruniform <lora:moderncheeruniform:1>,in front of a plain background
sexy african american woman in moderncheeruniform <lora:moderncheeruniform:1>,in front of a plain background
sexy blonde woman in moderncheeruniform <lora:moderncheeruniform:1>,in front of a plain background
sexy asian woman in moderncheeruniform <lora:moderncheeruniform:1>,in front of a plain background
sexy brunette woman in moderncheeruniform <lora:moderncheeruniform:1>,in front of a plain background
sexy (blonde with short bob hair) in a blue moderncheeruniform, in a football stadium,  front view, <lora:moderncheeruniform:0>

modelVersions.name: v1.0
modelVersions.description: The "classic" cheerleader look, generally reserved for old movies and Halloween costumes today, but common in the mid to late 20th century.
